ruleset.name: Apex Design Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex design issues (structure, method signatures, class organization)

rule.name: AvoidLowValueWrapperMethods
rule.message: Methods that only wrap a simple type check or trivial operation should be inlined to reduce unnecessary indirection
rule.description:
Methods that only wrap simple operations (such as a single instanceof check) should be inlined. These wrapper methods add unnecessary indirection without providing value, making the code harder to understand and maintain.
Version: 1.0.1
